name: Virtual Tokyo Tower
description:
The Virtual Tokyo Tower is a futuristic entertainment space that is inspired by the image of "Tokyo Tower 100 years from now. Using 3D models called "avatars," visitors can ascend to the Main Deck (150 meters high) and Top Deck (250 meters high) to enjoy a 360° panoramic night view from the center of Tokyo, just like the real Tokyo Tower. In addition, users can communicate with others who are participating in the multi-participation program, and can have dates and participate in events inside the virtual Tokyo Tower.

Visitors can enjoy the digital aquarium while enjoying the night view on the Top Deck, and on the Main Deck, visitors can enjoy content such as a shrine of love fulfillment as a power spot.
Visitors can also enjoy shopping at the virtual store in the Virtual Tokyo Tower Foot Town, and have their purchases delivered to their homes at a later date. Furthermore, an outdoor festival venue will be set up at the foot of the Virtual Tokyo Tower, where music live performances by artists, fashion shows, gourmet events, etc. can be held, allowing visitors to enjoy the entertainment of the Virtual Tokyo Tower from a variety of angles!


Top Deck (Observation Deck): Admire the glittering world of mirrors and fish floating in midair!
Main Deck 2F (Observation Deck): Pray at the shrine, a power spot!
Main Deck 1F (Observation Deck): You can see the night view of Tokyo Tower 100 years from now!


Tokyo Tower Below: You can see the virtual Tokyo Tower from directly below!
Special festival venue: This stage will be used for live performances by artists in the future!
Foot Town: Enjoy shopping at the virtual store!
